column1: Hi,I am planning north east trip with my husband and 3 year old son. want to know the road conditions through out from Kolkata as we are doing road trip. How are north Sikkim roads? What's the best hotel to stay in Lachen? Can I take my kid to gurudongmar lake and other places. Please suggest.Thank you in advance
When are you planning to visit
Temporary travel restrictions in North Sikkim for all tourists due to Coronavirus
